critique: The document is a formal announcement of the approval of a Code of Fair Competition for the Canning and Packing Machinery Industry. The language is legal and procedural, with no explicit emotional expression. However, the context suggests a sense of optimism and progress due to the implementation of the National Industrial Recovery Act. Therefore, I will assign low scores to all emotions except joy, which will receive a slightly higher score. After reflection, I believe the initial scores accurately reflect the document's emotional content, so the revised scores will remain the same.
